```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("AirBnBData.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Amount)) + geom_histogram(colour="black", fill= "#ff5a5f") +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept=mean(Amount)), colour="black", linetype="dashed", size=1) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept=median(Amount)), colour='red', linetype="dashed", size=1) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle("Distribution of AirBnB's Funding for Open Source on Open Collective") +
  ylab("Count") +
  xlab("Amount") +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0))
```
